channel.title: Need Help

item.title: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

I keep getting this error while I’m trying to use 2 prepared statements and checking if a row already exists. The errors are saying that sql2 is not a statement and it can’t find sql2: public static Map<String, Clan> clans; private static ClanManager clanManager; public static boolean sendClans(){ clanManager = new ClanManager(); PreparedStatement ps; try { try { clans = (HashMap<String, Clan>) XStreamUtil.getXStream().fromXML(new FileInputStream("data/clans.xml")); } catch (Exception e) { clans = new HashMap<String, Clan>(); } for (Map.Entry<String, Clan> entries : clans.entrySet()) { final Clan clan = entries.getValue(); clan.setTransient(); String sql = "SELECT * FROM clans WHERE roomOwner = ?"; ps = con.prepareStatement(sql); ps.setString(1, clan.getOwner()); ResultSet group = ps.executeQuery(); if(!group.next()) String sql2 = "INSERT INTO clans(name,roomOwner) values (?, ?)"; ps = con.prepareStatement(sql2); ps.setString(2, clan.getName()); ps.setString(3, clan.getOwner()); ps.executeUpdate(); } } catch (SQLException e) { //e.printStackTrace(); return false; } return true; }
Any ideas?

Read full topic
